text:
Hi All.
When using the drag and drop section, if I drag a module onto the page and drop it to the bottom of another section, it creates a new section and adds the module.

If I then delete that module, it leaves a place holder saying "Drop Module Here".

For the life of me, I can't work out how to get rid of unwanted Columns and Sections.

Looking at the post above, they have a "Section" drop down with the option to Delete section. I don't have this feature. How do I enable it OR how do I delete an unwanted section in a DND area?

All help appreciated. TIA!

Looking at this HubSpot page, the page layout tool has the "section" tab  and "module" tab at the top of each element on the screen - which is exactly what I need. Anyone know how to turn this on?
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/edit-page-content-in-a-drag-and-drop-area>
